new_skill_specs.name: analyze_geometric_configuration
new_skill_specs.purpose: Analyze a geometric configuration in an image to compute unknown angles or lengths based on known elements and constraints.
new_skill_specs.outputs: Computed measure of the unknown angle or length.

tests.input: {"image_hash": "e6b07bb7a6a5", "known_elements": {"angle A": 60, "lines FG": "parallel to DE"}, "unknowns": ["angle BCH"], "constraints": ["angle bisector AB"]}
